title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 550.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 550.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For purposes of this Part: (a) The term executive deputy commissioner
means the executive deputy commissioner of the New York State Office of

Information Technology Services. (b) The term office means the New York State

Office of Information Technology Services. (c) The term record means a record as defined
in section 86 of the Freedom of Information Law. (d) The term records access officer means an
employee of the office designated by the executive deputy commissioner to
receive and respond to inquiries to inspect and copy those records in the
possession of the office. Notes

York State Register April 4, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 14, eff. 4/4/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
